desc: Our Straws are made from natural wheat and cane stems. They are 100% biodegradable, compostable, zero-waste and plastic-free. Order eco-friendly straws now!

layout.text:
MADE OF CANE
& WHEAT AND
NOTHING ELSE
We’ve created YesStraws as an eco-friendly alternative to harmful plastic straws. Let’s change the world for the better together.
